meanings.definition: Consisting of three parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The trimeric puzzle had three pieces that fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The trimeric necklace had three beautiful gemstones hanging from it.
meanings.sent3: The trimeric team of friends always stuck together like glue.
meanings.sent4: The trimeric bond between the siblings was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The trimeric pattern on the rug caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: Formed by the combination of three molecules
meanings.sent1: The trimeric compound was created by mixing three different substances.
meanings.sent2: The trimeric solution required the precise addition of three chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The trimeric potion brewed by the wizard had unexpected effects.
meanings.sent4: The trimeric blend of flavors in the dish was surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent5: The trimeric reaction in the lab was a success.

meanings.definition: Having a structure or arrangement in groups of three
meanings.sent1: The trimeric formation of the dancers on stage was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The trimeric design of the building's pillars added a unique touch.
meanings.sent3: The trimeric seating arrangement at the party caused some confusion.
meanings.sent4: The trimeric melody of the song resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The trimeric display of colors in the painting was striking.
